author: Joshua Fluke
description:
Overemployment is officially “fraud” now… at least according to a CEO who’s currently running four companies at once.
Today we’re looking at the latest corporate clown show: an AI-powered “Know Your Employee” system that claims it can detect whether you — yes, you — have a second job.

Because apparently, working multiple jobs to survive?
That’s theft.
But CEOs juggling five boards, three startups, and a family office?
That’s “leadership,” baby.

In this video, we break down:

Why this new “employment fraud detector” is basically a surveillance tool

The hilarious hypocrisy behind the founder’s own resume

Why companies fear output-based work

How this weaponizes employers against people just trying to pay rent

And why overemployment isn’t going anywhere, no matter how many LinkedIn posts go viral

If you’ve ever had a boss who can’t measure results, hates remote workers, or calls defending your paycheck “fraud,” this one’s for you.

#RecruiterCringe #LinkedInLunatics #JoshuaFluke

N
title: WORKING TWO JOBS IS FRAUD?!
